data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: What is ComfyUI-Dart?
data.answer: ComfyUI-Dart is a custom node for ComfyUI that adds nodes to generate danbooru tags using Dart (Danbooru Tags Transformer).

data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: How do I install ComfyUI-Dart?
data.answer: To install ComfyUI-Dart, you need to navigate to the custom_nodes directory of your ComfyUI installation and clone the repository using git clone https://github.com/nkchocoai/ComfyUI-Dart.git.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: What nodes does ComfyUI-Dart provide?
data.answer: ComfyUI-Dart provides several nodes including Dart Generate, Dart Compose Prompt, Dart Generation Config, Dart Ban Tags From Regex, Dart Generate(Advanced), Dart Decode, Dart Rearranged By Animagine, Dart Decode By Splited Parts, and Dart Remove Tag Token.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: What is the purpose of the Dart Generate node?
data.answer: The Dart Generate node generates danbooru tags using the Dart (Danbooru Tags Transformer).

data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: Can I specify tags to be removed in the Dart Generate node?
data.answer: Yes, you can specify tags to be removed in the Dart Generate node using the `remove_tags` option.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: What is the Dart Generate(Advanced) node's function?
data.answer: The Dart Generate(Advanced) node outputs a token ID sequence of danbooru tags generated by Dart (Danbooru Tags Transformer).

data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: How can I decode the token ID sequence?
data.answer: You can decode the token ID sequence using the Dart Decode node.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: Can I rearrange the token ID sequence using ComfyUI-Dart?
data.answer: Yes, you can rearrange the token ID sequence using the Dart Rearranged By Animagine node.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: Does ComfyUI-Dart provide a way to remove tags from the token ID sequence?
data.answer: Yes, you can remove specified tags from the token ID sequence using the Dart Remove Tag Token node.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Dart
data.question: Where can I find the syntax guide for prompts in the Dart Generate node?
data.answer: The syntax guide for prompts in the Dart Generate node can be found at https://huggingface.co/p1atdev/dart-v1-sft#prompt-guidde.
